Interface User

All Known Implementing Classes:
Customer, Trader
public interface User
A general interface for the users of e-shopping application

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void exeCommand​(int command)
    Executes given command for the User Command list can be accessed by using printCommandList() method
    int getID()
    Returns ID of the User
    java.lang.String getName()
    Returns name of the User
    java.lang.String getPassword()
    Returns password of the User
    default boolean isSamePerson​(int ID, java.lang.String password)
    Returns true if given parameters is the same with this user's information
    void printCommandList()
    Prints available commands for the user to the console After seeing commands user can execute any available command by using exeCommand
    void setID​(int ID)
    Changes ID of the User with given parameter
    void setName​(java.lang.String name)
    Changes name of the User with given parameter
    void setPassword​(java.lang.String password)
    Changes password of the User with given parameter

  • Method Details

    • getID

      int getID()
      Returns ID of the User
      Returns:
      ID of the User

    • getPassword

      java.lang.String getPassword()
      Returns password of the User
      Returns:
      Password of the User

    • getName

      java.lang.String getName()
      Returns name of the User
      Returns:
      Name of the User

    • setID

      void setID​(int ID)
      Changes ID of the User with given parameter
      Parameters:
      ID - New ID of the User

    • setPassword

      void setPassword​(java.lang.String password)
      Changes password of the User with given parameter
      Parameters:
      password - New password of the User

    • setName

      void setName​(java.lang.String name)
      Changes name of the User with given parameter
      Parameters:
      name - New name of the User

    • exeCommand

      void exeCommand​(int command)
      Executes given command for the User Command list can be accessed by using printCommandList() method
      Parameters:
      command - Selected command that will be executed

    • printCommandList

      void printCommandList()
      Prints available commands for the user to the console After seeing commands user can execute any available command by using exeCommand

    • isSamePerson

      default boolean isSamePerson​(int ID, java.lang.String password)
      Returns true if given parameters is the same with this user's information
      Parameters:
      ID - ID of searched person
      password - Password of searched person
      Returns:
      True when parameters is same with this user's information
